attributes.action: to reintroduce the 10p rate of tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The lower paid are now worse off, now that the 10p rate has been abolished,what with council tax bills rising and all fuel bills,water rates etc and now more money being taken from the wages of the poorer paid ie those on 18,000 or less so please return the tax system to how it was Mr Brown

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
